text: int main ( void ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int arr [ n ] ; for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d " , & arr [ i ] ) ; int sum , max = 0 , count = 0 ; for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { max = 0 ; for ( int j = i ; j < n ; j ++ ) { sum = arr [ i ] + arr [ j ] ; if ( sum > max ) { max = sum ; count ++ ; } } } printf ( "%d\n" , count ) ; } return 0 ; }
